	We&#39;re seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Factory Supervisor to join our team.

	Strong leadership and communication skills
	Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment
	Basic knowledge of production planning and control
	Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.


Benefits


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Comfortable accommodation provided to ease living expenses
	Opportunities for professional growth and development
	Collaborative and supportive work environment

Human Resource & Administrative Manager Job at Azikel Group




        
    

        
        Azikel Group is a dynamic conglomerate of companies in the business of dredging, petroleum, power generation and aviation. Our philosophy is centered around sustainable development, through industrialization, infrastructural development, with energy sustainability and petroleum product sufficiency, thereby gearing the development of the people, creating employment and wealth. Our focus is on the areas of critical drivers to societal development and sustainability where we have the highest level of competence.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource & Administrative Manager

Job Location: Yenagoa, Bayelsa
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Oversee recruitment, onboarding and staff development.
	Manage employee relations and performance evaluations.
	Develop and implement company policies and procedures.
	Coordinate administrative activities and office management.

	Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration or related field.
	Proven experience in HR and administration.
	Strong leadership skills, communication skills and knowledge of employment law and HR best practices.
	Age: 25 - 45 years.
